---

```
visited = [False] * (C + 1)
stack = [1]
visited[1] = True
cnt = 0

while stack:
    node = stack.pop()
    for nxt in graph[node]:
        if not visited[nxt]:
            visited[nxt] = True
            cnt += 1
            stack.append(nxt)

print(cnt)
```
